channel.title: It wont let me Drop anything? can someone help
channel.description: i cant Drop anything or destroy anything can someone help ?

item.title: It wont let me Drop anything? can someone help
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.source: It wont let me Drop anything? can someone help

item.title: It wont let me Drop anything? can someone help
item.dc:creator: @Encryptic Encryptic
item.description:
@Encryptic wrote:

If you are set as an Admin, find your Config folder in your Source.
Look for something that resembles:
public static final boolean ADMIN_CAN_TRADE = true; //can admins trade?
public static final boolean ADMIN_CAN_SELL_ITEMS = true; // can admins sell items?
public static final boolean ADMIN_DROP_ITEMS = true; // can admin drop items?

As you can see, mine are set to True.
If you are an Admin and can not drop anything, then to my Knowledge the “ADMIN_DROP_ITEMS = true” is “ADMIN_DROP_ITEMS = false” for you.

Sorry if you do not understand. Tried to make it as simple and clear as possible.

Read full topic
item.source: It wont let me Drop anything? can someone help

item.title: It wont let me Drop anything? can someone help
item.dc:creator: @Kayceee Kayceee
item.description:
@Kayceee wrote:

Sometimes admins can’t drop or trade on some bases.
Try dropping as a normal player, see if it works, and try 5 different items, as some may be disabled (Coins, customs, etc).

Read full topic
